text: Braddell MRT station (NS18) is an underground Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) station located on the North South Line in Toa Payoh, Singapore. It was the first underground station on the MRT network with side platforms due to space constraints. ==Former Codes== Formerly the code was: N9 ==Related pages== *Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) ==Other websites== * Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations Category:1987 establishments in Singapore
title: Braddell MRT station
